original: Lilie, Einar Teodor, fil. dr, rektor, Göteiborg, f. 26/7/90 i Strö, Skarab. 1. G. 13 m. Ester Nordlund. Barn: Lars f. 13, civ:ing., Brita 15, g. m. för-säljn:chef Artur Petersson, Inga-Lisa 17, g. m. med. kand. Card-Eric Persson, Ulla 19. — Stud:ex. i Skara 09, fil. kand. i Gbg 11, fil. mag. 14, fil. lic. 19, fil. dr 23, provår v. Gbgs h. latin 16. E. o. lär. v. Gbgs östra real 14-15 o. 17-18, Gbgs västra real 17, Gbgs h. latin 18-20, adj. i modersm. o. tyska v. Gbgs h. real 20, ord. ämneslär. i samma ämnen v. Gbgs komm. mellansk. ’samt rektor där sed. 26. Tf. undervisn :råd somr. 30, 31, 33 o. 39, sekr. h. lärovrsakk. 31-32, ordf. i Komm. mellansk. rekt. fören. sed. 30, i Pedag. säl-Isk. i Gbg 37-42. Ordf. i Västg. gille i Gbg sed. 38. Utrymn:-chef i Gbg 39-41. Var på sin tid bl. a. akad. mäst. i längdhopp o. tresteg samt nord. akad. mäst. i samma grenar 19. Inneh. ett stort antal för-tr :uppdrag inom idr :rör., bl. a. sekr. i Gbgs högsk. stud. IF 14, dess v. ordf. 17 o. ordf. 22, sekr. i Örgryte IS 16, dess v. ordf. 17-21, ordf. 32-38 samt därefter hed :ordf., led. av styr. f. Sällsk. f. friluftslekar i Gbg 20-34, be-redn. f. Slottskogsvallen o. idr:plats-styr. 21-34, ordf. i komm. mellansk. IF ised. 26, i Gbgs skolidr :förb. sed. 35; styr:led. i Sv. idr:förb. 21-39, i Skolidr :förb. sed. 21, Sv. lekförb. 22-25, Sv. fotib:förb. 22, led. av Riks-idr:förb. överstyr, sed. 25, ordf. i Sv. idr :förb. komm. f. kvinnl. idr., init:-tag. t. samt en av «tift. av Sv:es kvinnl. idr:förb, 25, dess ordf. 25-27, v. ordf, i Int. ’kvinnl. idr:förb. 26-34, sv. repr. v. ett flert. kongr. f. sk-ol-idr. o. kvinnl. idr. Res. t. Tyski. 12, Engl. 25 m. fl. Red. f. Sv. Idrott 22, utgav tills. m. G. Malmgren Skol-idr .-boken 22. Skr.: Stud. över no-mina agentis i nutida svenska (grad:-avh. 21), Hur skall jag tala o. skriva? (28), Realskolans läsebok I-V (tills, m. N. Hänninger, E. Werner o. J. Mjöberg 32-36), Folksk. läsebok (tills, m. komm. 38-41), Vårt sv. språk i tal o. ’Skrift I-III (39, 44, 47), Vår litt. o. dess hist. I-IV, art. i bildn:-, upp-fostr:- o. idrrfrågor. Hållit ett flert. föredr. i idr. ämnen. RVO, Sv. idr:-förb. GM, SkidlSM m. m.
translated: Lilie, Einar Teodor, Ph.D., principal, Gothenburg, b. 26/7/90 in Strö, Skarab. 1st marriage 13 years with Ester Nordlund. Children: Lars b. 13, civil engineer, Brita b. 15, married to sales manager Artur Petersson, Inga-Lisa b. 17, married to medical candidate Card-Eric Persson, Ulla b. 19. - High school examination in Skara 09, Bachelor of Arts in Gothenburg 11, Master of Arts 14, Licentiate of Philosophy 19, Doctor of Philosophy 23, probationary year at Gothenburg Higher Latin School 16. Acting teacher at Gothenburg East Real School 14-15 and 17-18, Gothenburg West Real School 17, Gothenburg Higher Latin School 18-20, assistant teacher in mother tongue and German at Gothenburg Higher Real School 20, regular subject teacher in the same subjects at Gothenburg Municipal Middle School and principal since 26. Temporary education councilor in summer 30, 31, 33 and 39, secretary of the higher education examination committee 31-32, chairman of the Municipal Middle School Principals Association since 30, at the Gothenburg Pedagogical Institute 37-42. Chairman of the Västgöta Guild in Gothenburg since 38. Evacuation manager in Gothenburg 39-41. Was at one time among other things a collegiate champion in long jump and triple jump, as well as a Nordic collegiate champion in the same events in 19. Holds a large number of honorary positions in sports, including secretary of the Gothenburg University Student Sports Association 14, vice chairman 17 and chairman 22, secretary of the Örgryte Sports Club 16, vice chairman 17-21, chairman 32-38, and thereafter honorary chairman, member of the board of the Society for Outdoor Games in Gothenburg 20-34, preparations for Slottskogsvallen and sports venues 21-34, chairman of the Municipal Middle School Sports Club since 26, Gothenburg School Sports Association since 35; board member of the Swedish Sports Federation 21-39, School Sports Association since 21, Swedish Play Association 22-25, Swedish Football Association 22, member of the national sports federation since 25, chairman of the Swedish Sports Federation Committee for Women's Sports, initiator and one of the founders of the Swedish Women's Sports Association, chairman 25-27, vice chairman of the International Women's Sports Federation 26-34, Swedish representative at several congresses for school sports and women's sports. Traveled to Germany 12, England 25, and others. Editor of Swedish Sport 22, co-authored with G. Malmgren "School Sports Book" 22. Writings: Studies on nominal agents in contemporary Swedish (thesis 21), How should I speak and write? (28), High School Reader I-V (together with N. Hänninger, E. Werner, and J. Mjöberg 32-36), Primary School Reader (together with committee 38-41), Our Swedish Language in Speech and Writing I-III (39, 44, 47), Our Literature and its History I-IV, articles on portraits, education, and sports issues. Gave several lectures on sports topics. Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa, Swedish Sports Federation Gold Medal, Swedish Ski Championship, etc.

awards.name: Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa

publications.name: Our Swedish Language in Speech and Writing
